title: Pixel 3 weather widget - unable to add new location to existing list
content:
Here is the issue I'm trying to fix on my pixel 3 running Android 9 build number PQ2A.19035.002
search and open a new location in the weather widget
click on the "ADD" link in the "add this location to you list" message.
"location add" message gets displayed and the widget goes back to your current location.
check your list of saved location - the new location is not there....
uninstalling google app updates, rebooting, re-installing updates did not fx the issue.
clearing the application cache, did not the fix the issue.
